roleset.name: adapt

example.name: the one example
example.text: But it is Mr. Lane, as movie director, producer and writer, who *trace*-1 has been obsessed with *trace*-1 refitting Chaplin's Little Tramp in a contemporary way.
example.arg: who -> Mr. Lane, as movie director, producer and writer,

roleset.note: Other args may or may not appear in wider usage; treebank is notforthcoming with more data.
